raw: h sa de bak kredical College bua Trento n. China' 4th Nov 1988, A. E. Starus Eg, 1956 Deartir, Having heard for my don Soonding Kwan kah hei ww under your kid care and guidance, ay I have the honor to thank you for the kind protection whith you have luded to him. It is really fortuna on my hart to have such a bhristian-like and liberal minded person as you are to look after the Chiese boy whose picture happiness, and improvimit their Guntry LA

metadata.name: Phillips Academy
metadata.abstract: Letter thanking Stearns for his care and guidance of his son, Sung Sing, saying that it is important to have Stearns, a Christian-like and liberal minded person to look after the Chinese students, who will contribute to their country's improvement. He encloses a draft for $500 for his son's expenses.
metadata.collection: Head of School (Stearns) correspondence with Chinese alumni
